photo.description: As you walk in the Salt Cathedral, you will see many beautiful caves.
photo.tags: colombia cundinamarca catedraldesaldezipaquira thesaltcathedral undergroundmine mineralmine touristvisit populartouristplace saltmine walkinginsidethesaltmine cross cave
photo.title: One of the caves in the Salt Cathedral -- 015

photo.description: The Salt Cathedral of Zipaquirá (Spanish: Catedral de Sal de Zipaquirá) is an underground Roman Catholic church built within the tunnels of a salt mine 200 meters underground in a Halite mountain near the town of Zipaquirá, in Cundinamarca, Colombia. It is a very popular tourist destination and place of pilgrimage in the country
photo.tags: colombia architecture cave mine cathedral zipquira saltcathedral catedraldesal
photo.title: Catedral de Sal de Zipaquirá

photo.description: The Salt Cathedral of Zipaquirá (Spanish: Catedral de Sal de Zipaquirá) is an underground Roman Catholic church built within the tunnels of a salt mine 200 meters underground in a Halite mountain near the town of Zipaquirá, in Cundinamarca, Colombia. It is a very popular tourist destination and place of pilgrimage in the country

photo.title: Catedral de Sal de Zipaquirá

photo.description: The Salt Cathedral of Zipaquirá (Spanish: Catedral de Sal de Zipaquirá) is an underground Roman Catholic church built within the tunnels of a salt mine 200 meters underground in a Halite mountain near the town of Zipaquirá, in Cundinamarca, Colombia. It is a very popular tourist destination and place of pilgrimage in the country

photo.title: Catedral de Sal de Zipaquirá

photo.description: You can easily get lost in this place. It is best to go with a tour guide.
photo.tags: colombia cundinamarca catedraldesaldezipaquira thesaltcathedral undergroundmine mineralmine touristvisit populartouristplace saltmine walkinginsidethesaltmine cave
photo.title: Looking into the depths of the Salt mine in the Salt Cathedral-- 022

photo.description: Tour guide with the tourists.
photo.tags: colombia cundinamarca catedraldesaldezipaquira thesaltcathedral undergroundmine mineralmine touristvisit populartouristplace saltmine walkinginsidethesaltmine cross tourists
photo.title: One of many salt caves found in the Catedral de Sal 024

photo.description: On my third hit, I get a large chunk of salt.

photo.title: Three strikes is all it took...

photo.title: Catedral de Sal 100

photo.description: From a hill overlooking the main plaza of Zipaquira, Colombia. Taken while attempting to find the Salt Cathedral.

photo.description: Everyone is getting a chance to swing a pick axe... to bad nobody did much of a dent (until I got to bat).
